paragraphs.body: Can a Location page have a quote? Dcasawang1 - Talk - Contributions 21:42, 25 February 2009 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: Can a Location page have a quote? Dcasawang1 - Talk - Contributions 21:42, 25 February 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I was under the impression that we decided not to put quotes on Nation, Bending and Location pages. Organization Pages yes, Character pages yes, but not the others.  - Zero - Talk 04:30, 27 February 2009 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: I was under the impression that we decided not to put quotes on Nation, Bending and Location pages. Organization Pages yes, Character pages yes, but not the others.  - Zero - Talk 04:30, 27 February 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I was here. We reached an agreement that the quotes would only go on character and Organisation Pages. Not on the Bending or Nation Pages at least. I assume that since the Nation pages were barred then the location Pages were also. Am I wrong?  - Zero - Talk 06:25, 27 February 2009 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: I was here. We reached an agreement that the quotes would only go on character and Organisation Pages. Not on the Bending or Nation Pages at least. I assume that since the Nation pages were barred then the location Pages were also. Am I wrong?  - Zero - Talk 06:25, 27 February 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Perhaps I am mistaken about the location pages, but I am sure about the Nation and Bending Pages.  - Zero - Talk 15:44, 27 February 2009 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: Perhaps I am mistaken about the location pages, but I am sure about the Nation and Bending Pages.  - Zero - Talk 15:44, 27 February 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: And if you reach to a new agreement? Dcasawang1 - Talk - Contributions 15:58, 27 February 2009 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: And if you reach to a new agreement? Dcasawang1 - Talk - Contributions 15:58, 27 February 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: And I believe the quotes should be only on the character pages. Seems we're at odds. I wish it weren't so.  - Zero - Talk 04:13, 4 March 2009 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: And I believe the quotes should be only on the character pages. Seems we're at odds. I wish it weren't so.  - Zero - Talk 04:13, 4 March 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I think the most would have quote, but not all. Dcasawang1 - Talk - Contributions 19:29, 6 March 2009 (UTC)
